shows.title: Freemasonry & the Paranormal / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Author, lecturer, and hypnotist Angel Millar joins guest host Rich Berra (email) for a conversation about Freemasonry and the paranormal, as well as personal and professional growth in this time of chaos and unpredictability. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Rich a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!

shows.title: Spiritual Warfare / Astrological Shifts
shows.first_half: Joining Rich Berra (email), Father Bob Bailey, aka the "Paranormal Padre," discusses his road to the paranormal, his work with the Holy Sword Apostolate in the field of spiritual warfare, and his experiences with Lorraine Warren. Followed by psychotherapist and astrologer Debra Silverman detailing how astrology can help us stay grounded, purposeful, and connected during a time of rapid global and personal change. She'll also delve into the major astrological shifts headed our way.
shows.second_half: 6-10pm PT: Art Bell - Somewhere in Time returns to 1/18/02 for a night of Open Lines on such topics as interdimensional beings and miracles.

shows.title: Unexplained Disappearances / UFO Attacks in Brazil
shows.first_half: First Half: Join George Knapp as he welcomes back David Paulides,  the renowned author and filmmaker behind the Missing 411 series. Their discussion focuses on unexplained disappearances in national parks and the government's opaque response to these cases.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Thiago Ticchetti is the National Director of MUFON in Brazil. He'll reveal the incredible cases of UFO attacks that occurred in Colares, state of Pará, Brazil, in 1977 and 1978, as well as recent UFO cases that continue to occur in the region. He'll also talk about the historic public hearing held in the Chamber of Deputies in Brasilia.

shows.title: Reversing Cognitive Decline / 19th Century Science & Supernatural
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Majid Fotuhi from the Johns Hopkins Mind/Brain Institute will share how you can prevent and reverse cognitive decline, boost memory, and enhance mental sharpness at any age, and bring us his research and results that have delivered measurable success for patients.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Joe Diamond, the Midwest Mystic, will discuss his research on how the 19th century became the birthplace of both science and the supernatural, when mesmerists, mediums, and early psychologists explored the unseen workings of the human mind. He'll also talk about his new show that combines history, psychology, and illusion.

shows.title: Extinction Warning / Akashic Records & Empowerment
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and educator Peter Solomon reports on Stephen Hawking's dire warning that humans have 100 years to become a multi-planetary species to avoid extinction. Solomon contends that humanity may be running out of time to confront the existential dangers created by our own technologies and will illuminate critical threats, including AI, climate collapse, and nuclear peril.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Mary Madeiras is a certified advanced Akashic Records practitioner & author. She'll share her work on what the Records are and their role as an empowering tool for life, including discovering one's soul’s purpose.

shows.title: Ancient Wisdom & Science / Power of Gratitude
shows.first_half: First Half: Author and researcher Billy Carson will discuss how ancient wisdom, quantum physics, and cutting-edge science intersect to reveal a much deeper reality than what we perceive with our five senses, taking us from the ancient Emerald Tablets to the latest peer-reviewed research on consciousness.
shows.second_half: Second Half: On this Thanksgiving Eve, publisher and author Brenda Knight talks about the magic of gratitude, how it can mend broken families, heal old hurts, and invite abundance. She'll illuminate the true power of kindness in a divided world, and how forgiveness unexpectedly clears the path for money and miracles.

shows.title: Space Mysteries, Thanksgiving Tips, & Open Lines
shows.guests: Jeff Nelken, Cheryll Jones, Marc D'Antonio
shows.first_half: First Hour: Food safety coach Jeff Nelken will share Thanksgiving and holiday tips to help us enjoy our holiday meals and make the best choices when shopping or dining out.
shows.second_half: Hours 2 + 3: C2C's investigative reporter Cheryll Jones presents her interview with astronomer and video analyst for MUFON, Marc D'Antonio, who will share his analysis of current space mysteries and what he's seeing at his SkyTour Livestream observatories. Marc will join the show live in the second hour.

shows.title: An Alien Future / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Filmmaker and UFO researcher Dean Alioto joins guest host Ryan Wrecker (email) to delve into the true definition of disclosure and what it will look like in the future. Alioto will contemplate the future of mankind and the possibilities of joining a community of advanced non-human intelligences, exploring both the advantages and disadvantages of this brave new era. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Ryan a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
